title: Lola & Virginia
overview: Life is never easy if your name is Lola, you're 12 years-old, live in a rundown neighborhood and have a couple of snotty little brothers to look after. Moreover, her world is turned upside down the day Virginia appears in her life. She is a stuck-up little rich girl who has everything: beauty, friends and good grades.Follow Lola and Virginia discovering friendship, love, jealousy, rivalry, betrayal and other day-to-day issues of teens lifes.
